info.title: ecomm-ordermanagement-service API
info.description: Handles creation, status/lifecycle updates, and storage of e-commerce orders. Integrates with Stripe for payments/refunds. Allows customers to view order history and admins to manage all orders. Captures shipping details, order items, and maintains an event log per order...

post.description: This operation requires session parameters: userId (ID, required).

201.description: Response JSON represents the most comprehensive form of the **order** object in the response. However, some properties may be omitted based on the object's internal logic.

400.description: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid parameters, preventing the server from processing it.

401.description: The request lacked valid authentication credentials or the credentials provided do not grant access to the requested resource.

404.description: The requested resource was not found on the server.

500.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 
  Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.
                      

Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'
Bearer.name: Authorization
